summary: An amnesiac soldier, seeking his lost love, arrives in Archangel in northern Russia to help the townsfolk in their fight against the Bolsheviks, all quite unaware that the Great War ended three months ago.
cast: Michael Gottli|David Falkenburg|Michael O'Sullivan|Margaret Anne MacLeod|Ari Cohen|Sarah Neville|Kathy Marykuca|Kyle McCulloch|Victor Cowie|Ihor Procak|Robert Lougheed|Stephen Snyder|Michael Powell|Sam Toles|Lloyd Weinberg|Graham Bicq|Brent Neale|Caroline Bonner|Cheryl Falkenberg|Alyssa Szöke|Heather Neale|David Neale|Jilian Maddin|John Harvie|Shannon Garry|Donna Szöke|Jay Ashmore|Kate Bromley|Bruce Duggan|Ron Eyolfson|Ida Eyolfson|Bernice Peterson|Herdis Maddin|Mark Yuill|Kurt Moritz|Mitch Funk|Hans Ter Horst|Rick Match|Greg Klymkiw|David Isherwood|Neil Lawrie|Robert Nixon|Masha Geller|Therese Brabant|Tiffany Taylor|Jim Keller|Karen Harvich|Kei Ng|Gene Walz|Chris Johnson|Danielle Boilly|Elise Nelson|Bif Naked|Tracy Traeger|Angela Heck|Nicola Guttormson|Joe Burgess|Brad Linden|Mark Pomrenke|Dean Naday|Wayne Watson|Vince Rimmer|Renji Panicker|Carl Matheson|Ian Handford|Hirsch Binder|Don Hewak|Jeff Solylo|Steve Sandiford|Danny Gunn|David Cowie
keywords: absurd comedy|experimental film|surrealism|child with a gun|child
title: Archangel
